description: Dashboard visualizing Syslog records collected by Azure Monitor

options.content:
## Kubernetes Labels 

Kubernetes Labels are key-value pairs that attach identifying metadata to Kubernetes objects, enabling customers to identify, group, and execute bulk operations on objects based on certain criteria, such as by application, environment, or team. This dashboard visualizes Metadata collected by Kubernetes Labels. Read more in the Labels documentation here:  


Before starting, please ensure that: 
1. Private preview images are available in the cluster.
2. Log Analytics space is available in the correct regions.
3. Confirm ContainerLogV2 is enabled and the config map is applied.

Read more on annotation based filtering:

azureLogAnalytics.query:
ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where isnotempty(KubernetesMetadata)
| extend LabelsJson = parse_json(KubernetesMetadata).podLabels
| mv-expand LabelsJson
| extend LabelName = tostring(bag_keys(LabelsJson)[0])
| where LabelName == "$LabelKey"
| extend LabelValue = tostring(LabelsJson[LabelName])
| where LabelName == "$LabelValue"
| summarize TotalCount = count()

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| summarize Count = count() by LogSource

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), LogSource
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| render timechart

ContainerLogV2
| where TimeGenerated > ago(20min)
| where _ResourceId has "$Cluster"
| extend DataVolumeGB = _BilledSize / 1073741824
| summarize TotalDataVolumeGB = sum(DataVolumeGB) by PodNamespace

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId has "$Cluster"
| summarize LogCount = count() by PodNamespace

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| summarize LogCount = count() by Computer

ContainerLogV2
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, PodNamespace, PodName, ContainerName, ContainerId, KubernetesMetadata, LogMessage, LogLevel
| top 100 by TimeGenerated desc

panels.title: Last 100 Log Records - Click any row to access full list

azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters'
| where id has "$Cluster"
| extend props = parse_json(properties)
| extend lawResourceId = tostring(props.addonProfiles.omsAgent.config.logAnalyticsWorkspaceResourceID)
| extend LAWS = iff(isnotempty(lawResourceId), lawResourceId, tostring(props.addonProfiles.omsagent.config.logAnalyticsWorkspaceResourceID))
| project LAWS

azureLogAnalytics.query:
ContainerLogV2 
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where isnotempty(KubernetesMetadata)
| extend LabelsJson = parse_json(KubernetesMetadata).podLabels
| mv-expand LabelsJson
| extend LabelName = tostring(bag_keys(LabelsJson)[0])
| where isnotempty(LabelName)
| distinct LabelName

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where isnotempty(KubernetesMetadata)
| extend LabelsJson = parse_json(KubernetesMetadata).podLabels
| mv-expand LabelsJson
| extend LabelName = tostring(bag_keys(LabelsJson)[0])
| extend LabelValue = tostring(LabelsJson["$LabelKey"])
| where isnotempty(LabelValue)
| distinct LabelValue

title: Azure / Container Insights / Labels - Workspace centric
